detail.description: Incorporated in 1982, KMC Speciality Hospitals (India) is in the healthcare sector running, operating, maintaining multi-specialty hospital in Trichy. The company belongs to the Kauvery Hospitals group. The Company is primarily engaged in the business of rendering medical and healthcare services.
